name: A Lonely Life: Diary of Soul (Major Jam: Isolation)
name_original: A Lonely Life: Diary of Soul (Major Jam: Isolation)
description: A (very) short game in which you write in a skeleton named Soul's diary. Soul has been isolated from his community, but found you. Before finding you, he discovered he can only do things by writing them down in his diary. Play time: 5+ minutes.
